meanings.definition: A dental condition in which the lower teeth protrude beyond the upper teeth.
meanings.sent1: Her underbite made it difficult for her to chew properly.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended braces to correct the underbite.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's underbite gave him a unique and endearing look.
meanings.sent4: The underbite in the fence allowed the rabbit to escape the garden.
meanings.sent5: The underbite in the puzzle piece prevented it from fitting snugly.

meanings.definition: The condition of having an underbite.
meanings.sent1: His underbite caused him to have trouble biting into apples.
meanings.sent2: The orthodontist specializes in treating patients with underbite.
meanings.sent3: The underbite in the cartoon character made kids giggle.
meanings.sent4: The underbite of the cliff created a dangerous overhang.
meanings.sent5: The underbite of the bulldog made it look tough and determined.
